Interface Selectable

public interface Selectable

The Object of which this will be implemented upon would be able to be selected by the user and display Buttons on the ActionsPanel and information on the InformationPanel

Version:
Alpha 2.1
Author:
Alston Lin

Method Summary
 java.util.LinkedList<Button> getButtons()
          Will return Buttons, if any, that will be put on the ActionsPanel to allow the user to click on once the Object us selected.
 java.lang.String getInformation()
          Returns the text to display on the InformationPanel
 

Method Detail

getButtons

java.util.LinkedList<Button> getButtons()
Will return Buttons, if any, that will be put on the ActionsPanel to allow the user to click on once the Object us selected.

Returns:
A List of Buttons that the user can click

getInformation

java.lang.String getInformation()
Returns the text to display on the InformationPanel

Returns:
the text to display
